text: Meditation on Violence is a 1948 American 16 mm black and white experimental short film directed by Maya Deren. It explores in playing out the movements and performance of the Wu-tang ritual. It also obscures the distinction between violence and beauty. The film stars Chao-Li Chi and music by Teiji Ito. ==Cast== * Chao-Li Chi - Himself ==Referencers== ==External links== * * * Category:1948 short films Category:Experimental film Category:American silent short films Category:Films directed by Maya Deren
title: Meditation on Violence
